description: Hand Gesture Recognition using Electromyography (EMG) Signals. Designing an algorithm for hand gesture recognition from a stream of EMG sensors for a smart prosthetic application
paper_citation: Rahimi, Abbas, et al. Hyperdimensional biosignal processing: A case study for EMG-based hand gesture recognition. 2016 IEEE International Conference on Rebooting Computing (ICRC). IEEE, 2016.
